basics.name: Hyungjin Ahn
basics.label: Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: Undergraduate student majoring in Computer Science who is interested in Deep Learning and Application development.

work.name: ISoft Lab, Chungnam National University
work.summary: Conducted research on zero-shot/few-shot learning capabilities of LLMs, investigated performance variations based on few-shot prompt distributions, and applied quantization techniques to Korean language models, exploring efficient ways to apply model compression.

work.name: 4th place, Republic of Korea
work.summary: Developed and maintained an application with 5,000+ active users over several years.

work.name: Episys Science, United States of America
work.summary: Full-stack web development using Next.js. Gained experience in AWS infrastructure management using Terraform.

awards.title: Chief of Naval Operations Award in TOPCIT
awards.summary: A comprehensive evaluation of practical ICT skills and competencies.

awards.title: Excellence Award in University Project Fair
awards.summary: Topic : AI-based Binary Lifting for Static Program Analysis

publications.name: Integrating OCR and LLMs for Enhanced Document Digitization in ERP Systems
publications.publisher: 2024 15th International Conference on Information and Communication Technology Convergence (ICTC)

publications.name: BitNet 양자화 기술 및 가중치 복사를 적용한 한국어 BERT 모델의 경량화 및 성능 분석
거대 언어 모델 기반 분류문제에서 유사도 활용 Few-shot 예제 기법 성능분석

publications.publisher: 제35회 한글 및 한국어 정보처리 학술대회 (HCLT 2023)

references.name: Professor Sangkeun Jung
references.reference: Professor of Computer Science at Chungnam National University. He was my advisor for my undergraduate research.
